## Setup Checklist

- [ ] Create paper directory under appropriate programme
- [ ] Initialize from dissensus-preprint template v3.0.0
- [ ] Set up `CLAUDE.md` entry with canonical file
- [ ] Create `code/` subdirectory if computational work
- [ ] Add to `farzulla-self-citations.bib` if referencing other papers
- [ ] Update `LEAN_FORMALIZATION_MAP.md` if formal proofs planned

## Development Milestones

- [ ] Literature review complete
- [ ] Data collection/analysis complete
- [ ] First draft complete
- [ ] Internal review
- [ ] Revision cycle
- [ ] Ready for submission
- [ ] Submitted to journal/arXiv
- [ ] Published
